name: Neo4j Dataflow template
description: Loads parquet files from GCS into a Neo4j GDS Graph.

parameters.name: neo4j_host
parameters.label: Neo4j Host or IP
parameters.helpText: The hostname or IP address of the target Neo4j server.

parameters.name: neo4j_port
parameters.label: TCP Port of Neo4j Arrow Flight service
parameters.helpText: The tcp port Neo4j's Arrow Flight Service is listening on.

parameters.name: neo4j_use_tls
parameters.label: Use TLS?
parameters.helpText: Connect to Neo4j using TLS? (Default is 'True'.)

parameters.name: neo4j_user
parameters.label: Username
parameters.helpText: Username of the Neo4j to use for authentication. (Default is 'neo4j')

parameters.name: neo4j_password
parameters.label: Password
parameters.helpText: Password of the provided Neo4j user account.

parameters.name: neo4j_graph
parameters.label: Graph
parameters.helpText: Unique name of the resulting Neo4j graph.

parameters.name: neo4j_database
parameters.label: Database
parameters.helpText: Name of the database to host the resulting graph. (Default is 'neo4j')

parameters.name: neo4j_concurrency
parameters.label: Server-side Concurrency
parameters.helpText: Number of worker threads to use for Neo4j's parallel processing. (Default is '4')

parameters.name: gcs_node_pattern
parameters.label: GCS Node Pattern URI
parameters.helpText: GCS uri file pattern to the node parquet files.

parameters.name: gcs_edge_pattern
parameters.label: GCS Edge Pattern URI
parameters.helpText: GCS uri file pattern to the edge parquet files.

parameters.name: neo4j_host
parameters.label: Neo4j Host or IP
parameters.helpText: The hostname or IP address of the target Neo4j server.

parameters.name: graph_json
parameters.label: Graph model URI
parameters.helpText: GCS URI to the Graph model JSON file.
